metadata.title: CVE-2020-26891 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: AuthRestServlet in Matrix Synapse before 1.21.0 is vulnerable to XSS due tounsafe interpolation of the session GET parameter. This allows a remoteattacker to execute an XSS attack on the domain Synapse is hosted on, bysupplying the victim user with a malicious URL to the/_matrix/client/r0/auth/*/fallback/web or/_matrix/client/unstable/auth/*/fallback/web Synapse endpoints.

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
